Reviews.Title: CoolPix camera
Reviews.Author: Bessie Vollmer
Reviews.Content: They call it COOLPIX for a reason it is a very cool camera very easy to use and great pictures every time.

Reviews.Title: Nikon 520
Reviews.Author: Ron Woodrow
Reviews.Content: This is a great bundle for the beginner. Good value and great camera. It was put together with all necessary parts

Reviews.Title: I'm very pleased with the way the 33 Street Camera treated me after a small problem.
Reviews.Author: Francisco Severiano
Reviews.Content: I had a problem with some items of the kit that came with the Nikon Coolpix P520. Some of them didn't match the photo in the Amazon site. But, after discribe this problem, the seller 33 Street Camera repaired  the mistake and sent me right items, on time. The salesman treated me with a lot of attention and resolved the problem quickly. As I asked, they shipped the items via UPS 2 day air so that I would be guaranteed to receive them in time before I left the country. So, I'm very pleased with the way the 33 Street Camera treated me.

Reviews.Title: Great little camera
Reviews.Author: J. Reed
Reviews.Content: This is a great little camera. Not too bulky or heavy to carry like most cameras of it's type. With a little practice it is very easy to use; much better than point and click digital cameras. I wish it came with a wrist strap  for easy carrying.

ProductInfo.Features:
This Kit includes 11 items all with USA Warranty and manufacturer's supplied accessories
Nikon COOLPIX P520 18.1 MP CMOS Digital Camera with 42x Zoom NIKKOR ED Glass Lens and GPS Record Location (Dark Grey)
32 Gigabyte SDHC Secure Digital Memory Card - Secure Digital USB Card Reader - Universal Memory Card Wallet - Pack of LCD Screen Protectors
Additional EN-EL5 Rechargeable Lithium ion Replacement Battery - Protective Digital Camera Carrying Case with Pockets and Strap
Full Size 50" Tripod w/Case - Extendable Tabletop Mini Tripod - Lens Care & Cleaning Kit - HDMI Cable for direct connection to HDTV - 25 FREE Quality Prints
ProductInfo.Name: Nikon COOLPIX P520 18.1 MP CMOS Digital Camera with 42x Zoom and "GPS" (Dark Grey) + EN-EL5 Battery + 9pc Bundle 32GB Deluxe Accessory Kit
